shortDescription: Jus place th markers, n we ave a naval Gauss rifle that shall zoom in n put a hole in that base so big, Fat Karl could walk in thar n get th loot.
longDescription: Well, this is certainly one way to solve the problem. Luckily, we're not paid to weigh in on whether it's a smart way to solve it.

contractObjectiveList.title: Secure the Facility and Designate the Fire Mission Target
contractObjectiveList.description: Attack the Installation and paint the area for a Fire Mission

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Alpha for Fire Mission Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Alpha for Artillery Desgination

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Bravo for Fire Mission Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Bravo for Artillery Desgination

objectiveList.title: Place Beacon Charlie for Fire Mission Designation
objectiveList.description: Place Beacon Charlie for Artillery Desgination

objectiveList.title: Get Visual Confirmation of the Fire Mission's Effect
Extract before the timer runs out.
Defeat the Enemy Air Defense
objectiveList.description: Defeat Enemy Air Defense to allow Employer Reinforcements to Land

dialogueContent.words: Finally, Me plunder be so close. Jus ave t make a new door or two t get it out.
We ave a Naval Gauss Rifle pointed in th general direction needs some help targetin it.
All ye needs t do be galleon these beepin thin s in th general area o where we tell ye. Ole Fred could hit a flea off o a strung out Dalmatian.
We ave this Gauss rifle attached t our dropship wit bungee cords 'n chewin' gum. better give us a target soon.
Do nah be standin around th target area. this thin makes craters.
When th thin goes boom. get out o thar!
Amazin, That thin exploded like a chicken wit dynamite strapped t its back!
Like th Albatross, ye be jinxed.
This thin be o er charged n ready t fire. One 20 ton slug o Nickle Ferris incomin.
Chargin ... Er Double chargin the capacitors.
Alpha beacon deployed, Commander. Good work.
Bravo beacon deployed, Commander.
Charlie beacon deployed.
All Local Forces, Get to the beacon sites immediately. This is not a drill!
All units, close distance on enemy forces. We have to disrupt those beacons!
That was more amazin' than amazin' Jack on monkey day. .
We have enemies incommin.
They be deploying now.
Ye ok o er thar?.
I will secure the map and the Peice myself. You have done well today!.
Just do what I say and stay do not give me unnecessary data.
Are you that Stupid?
Our queen has arrived. Ye be now saved!
Expect more bad scallywags too.
Hmmm. Commander, the Local Government seem to have a subterranean motor pool, and they're deploying armed vehicles from it.
It's part of the hardened bunker, and we can't disable it until the orbital strike completes. So, I suggest moving quickly.
We be firing, with our without those beacons.
Commander, my sensors show a large incoming enemy reaction force. Clear out of this area of operation!
We got this get out o here.
Did I say Fire NOW?
Warning: Incoming artillery fire.
